articles.title: Tokyo Olympics: Still the GOAT - Support pours in for Simone Biles after US Gymnast withdraws over mental health concerns - India Today
articles.description: Tokyo Olympics: Legendary US gymnast Simone Biles withdrew from the team final on Tuesday, citing mental health concerns. Her decision was widely appreciated by the sporting community as she was lauded for prioritising mental health.
